"Scan a product's barcode through the rectangle to retrieve its information and start building your shopping list"
"On the full map you can see other places that your current product was scanned along with its respective price."

"> 1. Put a product's barcode inside the scanner's rectangle (steady handling of the phone and good lighting make results faster).

" > "2. You can also manually enter a barcode through the applications menu.

" > "3. When a barcode is scanned successfully you will hear a "beep" sound (if you can't hear it, you might need to adjust your phone's sound volume).

" > "4. The application will indicate if the scanned product was found, show its title, price, and add it in your shopping list.

" > "5. If the product was not recognised by SmartBill, you will be asked to manually input the product's information which will be permanently saved for future use.

" > "6. You can edit or delete any item from your list by long-pressing it on the list.

" > "7. On the top right of the screen you can see indications of how many products you have scanned and your bill's state.

" > "8. You can click the button on the bottom right corner to view the map in full screen along with the locations that your current product was scanned before."

"SmartBill implemented by
Kyriakos Georgiou
Kyriakos Frangeskos
2012
